## ValidationSchema type

Definition of validation schema, which is a union of `StringValidation`<!-- -->, `StringArrayValidation` and `FuncValidation<any>`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ValidationSchema = StringValidation | StringArrayValidation | FuncValidation<any>;
```
